Models¶

Models file for Login App

consists of the model definitions for the login app

class login.models.EmailVerificationCode(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Codes for verifying user emails after registration related to django.contrib.auth.User

create_hash_code()[source]¶

Create a random hash code

set_expiry_date()[source]¶

Set the expiry date for code to 30 days from the time now

class login.models.PasswordResetCode(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Codes for users to recover their accounts related to django.contrib.auth.User

create_hash_code()[source]¶

Create a random hash code

set_expiry_date()[source]¶

Set the expiry date for code to 30 days from the time now

class login.models.UserProfile(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Teachers and student profiles who are portal users. related to django.contrib.auth.User

Models file for Discussion App

consists of the model definitions for the discussion app

class discussion.models.Attachment(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Stores detail for file attachements on a reply

related to discussion.models.Reply

size_in_kb()[source]¶

returns a string containing the size of the file in kb, example - “24 kb”

class discussion.models.DiscussionThread(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Stores a Discussion Thread related to login.models.UserProfile and discussion.models.Tag

time_elapsed()[source]¶

Time elapsed since the discussion thread was posted

class discussion.models.Reply(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Stores reply to a discussion thread related to discussion.models.DiscussionThread and login.models.UserProfile

time_elapsed()[source]¶

Time elapsed since the discussion thread was posted

class discussion.models.Tag(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Tags for discussions , news , events and schedules.

Models file for News and Event App

consists of the model definitions for the news_event app

class news_event.models.Event(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Stores a Schedule, related to login.models.UserProfile and discussion.models.Tag

short_description()[source]¶

returns first 200 characters of the description

time_elapsed()[source]¶

returns time elapsed since the event was posted

class news_event.models.News(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Stores a News article, related to discussion.models.Tag

short_description()[source]¶

returns first 200 characters of the description

time_elapsed()[source]¶

returns time elapsed since the news article was posted
